OUTLINE : This randomize , open-label , multicenter study . Patients stratify accord treatment center , performance status ( 0-1 v 2 ) , number metastatic site ( 1 vs 1 ) . Patients randomize one two treatment arm . - Arm I : Patients receive oxaliplatin IV 2 hour day 1 , leucovorin calcium IV 2 hour follow fluorouracil ( 5-FU ) IV 22 hour day 1 2 . - Arm II : Patients receive oxaliplatin IV leucovorin calcium IV 2 hour follow 5-FU IV 46 hour begin day 1 course 1-6 19-24 . For course 7-18 , patient receive leucovorin calcium IV follow 5-FU IV begin day 1 . Courses repeat every 14 day arm absence disease progression unacceptable toxicity . Quality life assess baseline , course 4 6 , every 6 course thereafter . Patients follow monthly 3 month every 3 month thereafter .
